Barbaras unconsious movements concluded when her boot was firmly flat on the ground, what she wasnt aware of was that she had a passenger stuck inside her treads, stuck tight in mashed grape, dried mud and small stones, you. She span on the ball of her foot, smearing any loose grape debris from her boot onto the floor, as she began walking you were carried away by barbara...
14213322.title: Ellie leaves just as the massive boots of barba...

info.brief_description: You shrink or become an object next to an unaware female at rooster teeth
info.description:
You become shrunk or turn into an inanimate object near a ladie from rooster teeth or related companies
Rule: the normal sized people do not know you exist, they MUST remain unaware of you at all times except after killing you if they make a remark about something strange.

Feel free yo add to tbis, i will remove if it doesnt fit the theme im going for so go for whatever
Only real rules are it must always be unaware and there must be NO male interaction at all

This is a female giantess only story.

Please do add to build this big, if you want to add more choices to a chapter feel free to ask

If you want something or someone in particular added, leave a review, message me or add it in its chapter spot with a description of what you want, ill write it, but if you feel you can add, do add to this story, it is open for anyone to add to
